Row.Text: Performs as if 1 level more experienced on wonder tiles.
Performs as if 2 levels more experienced on Entertainment Complex district tiles.
Performs as if 2 levels more experienced on Theater Square district tiles.
Civilizations within 10 tiles receive 50% of the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from this concert.
Performing a concert causes that city to lose 40 Loyalty.
Performs at National Parks and Natural Wonders for expected 1000 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism and 1 level more experienced.
Earn [ICON_GOLD] Gold equal to 25% of the [ICON_Tourism] Tourism generated.
Performs as if 2 levels more experienced on Water Park district tiles.
Performs a concert that converts the majority religion of that city to the religion founded by the player.
Performs at Spaceports and Campuses for +500 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism (+1000 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism if Campus has a University) and 1 level more experienced.
Performs at Seaside Resorts and Harbors for +500 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism (+1000 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism if Harbor has a Shipyard) and 1 level more experienced.
Breach Dam as if 2 levels more experienced.
When Counterspying all city districts are defended (and +1 level at districts within 1 hex).
If this Spy is in home territory, enemy Spies in your lands operate at 1 level below usual.
Ranged attacks against Cities and Encampments are 100% effective and gain +30 [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strength.
+3 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Can perform a Jump action to cross over mountain terrain.
+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against land and naval units.
